products.title: CHEESEBURGER
products.description: Our organic beef patty, onion, cheddar, pickles, mayo, mustard & ketchup in our organic, homemade bun. Served with fries and soda, water, organic lemonade or beer.

products.title: FRIED CHICKEN BURGER
products.description: Freshly battered chicken breast, lettuce, pickles, mayo & chipotle mayo in our organic, homemade bun. Served with fries and soda, water, organic lemonade or beer.

products.title: HALLOUMI BURGER (VEGETARIAN)
products.description: Fried halloumi, tomato, lettuce, onion, pickles & Jagger dip in our organic, homemade bun. Served with fries and soda, water, organic lemonade or beer.
